cat_txt: Just looking around? Let us suggest you something hot & happening!
quick_tip_text: Add information about your business below. Your business page will not appear in search results until this information has been verified and approved by our moderators. Once it is approved, you will receive an email with instructions on how to claim your business page.
listing_email_text: Enter email to signup & recieve notification upon listing approval
direct_payment_instruction:
Your full name and mailing address
Your Santander Bank account number
SWIFT Code - SVRNUS33 (International only)
Santander Bank routing number
listingpro_new_user_register: Hi there, Welcome to %website_url! You can login now using the below credentials: Username:%user_login_register Password: %user_pass_register If you have any problems, please contact us. Thank you!
listingpro_new_submit_listing_content: <div style="width: 100%; background: #f0f1f3; padding: 50px 0px;"> <a style="width: 45%; margin: 0 auto; text-align: center; display: block; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 30px; padding-right: 30px;"><img src="images/logo.png" /></a> <div style="width: 45%; background: #fff; padding: 50px 30px; margin: 0 auto;"> <p style="margin: 0px;">New  Listing has been submitted on <a href="%website_url" >%website_name</a> </p> <h2 style="color: #2a6ad4; margin: 0px; font-size: 20px;">%listing_title</h2> <div style="padding: 30px 0px 15px 0px;"> <h3 style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; font-size: 16px;">Details are Following:</h3> <p style="margin: 0px; font-size: 14px;"><strong style="padding-right: 10px;">Listing Name:</strong>%listing_title</p> <p style="margin: 0px; font-size: 14px;"><strong style="padding-right: 10px;">Listing URL:</strong>%listing_url</p> </div> <div style="padding: 15px 0px 30px 0px;"> <h3 style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; font-size: 16px;">Other Details:</h3> <p style="margin: 0px; font-size: 14px;"><strong style="padding-right: 10px;">Full Adress:</strong>45 B Road NY. USA</p> </div> </div> </div>

listingpro_content_listing_claimer: Your Claim on listing <a href="%listing_url">%listing_title</a> has been submitted
listingpro_subject_listing_author: A claim has been submitted on your listing
listingpro_content_listing_author: Hi, A claim has been submitted on your listing <a href="%listing_url">%listing_title</a>. Please contact admin for further details
listingpro_content_listing_claim_admin: You have received a new claim on a listing <a href="%listing_url">%listing_title</a> Please login on dashboard for more details
listingpro_content_listing_claim_approve: Your Claim on listing <a href="%listing_url">%listing_title</a> has been approved
Claim against your listing has been has been approved.Details are : <a href="%listing_url">%listing_title</a>
listingpro_content_campaign_activate: %author_name just activated an ad campaign for a listing <a href="%listing_url">%listing_title</a> with packages %campaign_packages
listingpro_content_campaign_activate_aut: You have activated a campaign on a listing <a href="%listing_url">%listing_title</a> With packages %campaign_packages
listingpro_content_recurring_payment: A Payment will be deduct from your card after %notifybefore day/days. Details are: Listing: %listing_title, Plan: %plan_title, Price: %plan_price, Duration: %plan_duration day/days
listingpro_content_recurring_payment_adm: A Payment is due by a user after %notifybefore day/days. Details are: Listing: %listing_title, Plan: %plan_title, Price: %plan_price, Duration: %plan_duration day/days
listingpro_content_lead_form: Someone has contacted you for the listing "%listing_title". Details are following<br>Name: %sender_name<br>Email: %sender_email<br>Phone:%sender_phone<br>Message: %sender_message
listingpro_content_review_author: Someone has reviewed on the listing "%listing_title" which is yours. Details are following<br>Reviewer: %reviewer_email<br>Review: %reviewtext<br>Listing:%listing_title<br>URL: %listing_url
listingpro_content_reviewer: You have reviewed on the listing "%listing_title". Details are following<br>Listing:%listing_title<br>URL: %listing_url
invoice_additional_info: The lorem ipsum text is typically a scrambled section of De finibus bonorum et malorum, a 1st-century BC Latin text by Cicero, with words altered, added, and removed to make it nonsensical, improper Latin.[citation needed]
invoice_thankyou: Thank you for your business with us.
lp_pro_text: Add information about your business below. Your business page will not appear in search results until this information has been verified and approved by our moderators. Once it is approved, you will receive an email with instructions on how to claim your business page.
cp-address: Your Address at Lutaco Tower 007A Nguyen Van Troi
cp-success-message: Your message was sent successfully! I will be in touch as soon as I can.
cp-failed-message: Something went wrong, try refreshing and submitting the form again.
author_info: Proudly Listingpro by Cridio Studio
